products.description: Our company selects the finest Sicilian products, bringing to your table the excellence and tradition of our land with passion and dedication.

cta.description: Discover our complete range of extra virgin oils and find the perfect one for your table

about.intro: We carry forward the tradition of the family oil company, dedicating ourselves to selecting the finest products from our land. With the same passion of three generations, we bring Sicilian excellence to your tables.

history.title: A Tradition of Excellence
history.paragraph1: It all began in 1940, when the first olive trees were planted in the Sicilian hills. With dedication and love for the land, a company was built that became synonymous with quality and authenticity.
history.paragraph2: After years when the company remained inactive, we decided to bring this family heritage back to life, dedicating ourselves to selecting the finest Sicilian products. We carry forward this tradition, choosing only the excellence of our land.
history.paragraph3: Today, OLIO GALIA represents the perfect meeting between tradition and innovation. We carefully select every product, keeping intact the values and quality methods of the family tradition, but with an eye to the future.

luca.name: Luca Galia
luca.description: Expert in cultivation and pressing techniques, Luca is responsible for maintaining the quality standards that made the family oil famous.
luca.quote: Each harvested olive carries the flavor of our land

andrea.name: Andrea Galia
andrea.description: With a modern business vision, Andrea takes care of customer relations and the company's commercial strategy.
andrea.quote: We bring Sicilian tradition to the world

lorenzo.name: Lorenzo Galia
lorenzo.description: The youngest of the brothers, Lorenzo manages the administrative and organizational aspect, ensuring efficiency in every process.
lorenzo.quote: Organization is the heart of every great tradition

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Each bottle reflects our highest standards.

family.title: Family
family.description: The company is a reflection of our family bonds. Every decision is made together, with mutual respect.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.description: We respect and preserve traditional methods, passing down our grandfather's wisdom.

faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our extra virgin oils, production and services offered by OLIO GALIA.

questions.question: How is your extra virgin oil produced?
questions.answer: Our oil is produced following traditional methods passed down from our grandfather. Olives are strictly hand-picked at the right degree of ripeness, then cold-milled within 24 hours of harvest. We use only mechanical processes without any chemical treatment, guaranteeing a 100% natural product.

questions.question: What is the difference between your oils?
questions.answer: We offer three types: Classic Oil with intense fruity and fresh grass notes, certified Organic Oil with delicate flavor and balanced spicy aftertaste, and Premium Oil from century-old olives with complex organoleptic profile. Each oil has unique characteristics suitable for different palates and uses.

questions.question: How to best store extra virgin oil?
questions.answer: To keep the organoleptic properties intact, store the oil in a cool and dry place, away from light and heat sources. The ideal temperature is between 14-18°C. Always close the cap tightly after use and consume within 18 months of opening. Our dark bottles already protect the oil from light.

questions.question: Do you ship throughout Italy?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship throughout Italy with express courier. For orders over €50, shipping is free. We use special packaging to protect bottles during transport. Delivery times are generally 2-3 working days. For international orders, contact us for specific information.

questions.question: Is the oil really produced in Sicily?
questions.answer: Absolutely yes. Our olive groves are located in the Sicilian hills where our grandfather planted the first trees in 1940. Every phase of production takes place on site: from cultivation to harvesting, from milling to bottling. We are proud of our 100% Sicilian origin.

questions.question: What certifications does your oil have?
questions.answer: Our oils are DOP (Protected Designation of Origin) certified and comply with all Italian and European quality standards. Organic oil has BIO certification issued by an accredited body. We carry out regular chemical and organoleptic analyses to guarantee acidity below 0.3% and excellent quality parameters.

questions.question: Is it possible to visit the company?
questions.answer: Certainly! We organize guided tours by reservation where you can personally meet us three brothers, visit the olive groves, witness the production process and taste our oils. The visits also include stories about the family history and Sicilian olive oil tradition. Contact us to schedule your visit.

questions.question: How can I be sure of the quality of your oil?
questions.answer: Quality is guaranteed by three generations of experience, certified chemical analyses, manual olive harvesting, cold pressing within 24 hours and rigorous controls at every stage. Each bottle bears the batch number for complete traceability. We also offer a satisfaction or money-back guarantee.

contact.title: Didn't find the answer?
contact.description: We are always available to answer your questions and help you choose the perfect oil for you.

faq.noFAQ: No FAQs available at the moment.

brand.description: Since 1940, three generations of Sicilian passion in every drop. We continue the family tradition with dedication and love for excellence.

newsletter.title: Stay always updated
newsletter.description: Receive our news, exclusive recipes and special offers directly in your email inbox
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. You can unsubscribe at any time.

newsletterModal.title: Subscribe to Newsletter
newsletterModal.description: Receive exclusive offers and news directly in your inbox
newsletterModal.privacy: By subscribing you agree to receive communications from Olio Galia. You can unsubscribe at any time.

hero.description: A family united by passion for Sicilian land and respect for traditions. Our story begins in 1940 with our grandfather Paolo and continues today with the same dedication and love for superior quality extra virgin oil.

events.title: The Beginning
events.description: The family olive oil company is founded in the Sicilian hills, with the first olive groves dedicated to producing quality extra virgin oil.
events.details: The company begins its activity with small plots of hilly land cultivated with olive trees. The choice of the Tonda Iblea variety proves to be successful.

events.title: The Idea
events.description: The family begins to design OLIO GALIA, a modern brand that can honor the family's olive oil tradition.
events.details: The idea is born to create a brand dedicated to selecting and promoting the excellence of Sicilian extra virgin olive oil, combining tradition and innovation.

events.title: The Opening
events.description: OLIO GALIA officially opens, beginning the selection of the finest Sicilian products to bring excellence to your table.
events.details: The brand becomes reality: with passion and dedication, the family selects the finest extra virgin oils and products of superior quality Sicilian tradition.

brothers.title: The Three Brothers
brothers.subtitle: Each with their own skills and specializations, but all united by the same passion for excellence and love for our land.

profiles.name: Luca Galia
profiles.description: The eldest of the brothers, Luca inherited the passion for the land from his grandfather Paolo. After graduating in Agriculture, he spent years perfecting organic cultivation and cold pressing techniques.
profiles.speciality: Agronomist specialized in organic olive growing
profiles.quote: Each harvested olive carries the flavor of our land
profiles.details: Luca gets up every morning at dawn to personally check the olive groves. His experience allows him to recognize the perfect moment for harvesting, when the olives have reached the right degree of ripeness.

profiles.name: Andrea Galia
profiles.description: Andrea brought a breath of modernity to the family business. His commercial vision has allowed Olio Galia to reach national and international markets, always maintaining product authenticity.
profiles.speciality: Degree in Marketing and Communication - Master in Export Management
profiles.quote: We bring Sicilian tradition to the world, one bottle at a time
profiles.details: Andrea has developed a network of distributors throughout Europe and created partnerships with starred restaurants that appreciate the quality of Olio Galia.

profiles.name: Lorenzo Galia
profiles.description: The youngest and most methodical of the brothers, Lorenzo has modernized all business processes. His administrative and organizational precision ensures that every aspect of the business works perfectly.
profiles.speciality: Chartered Accountant - Specialization in Management Control
profiles.quote: Organization is the heart of every great tradition
profiles.details: Lorenzo has implemented a complete product traceability system, from plant to bottle, guaranteeing maximum transparency to customers.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide every decision we make and are reflected in the quality of our extra virgin olive oil.

items.title: Supreme Quality
items.description: Each bottle represents the excellence of Sicilian extra virgin oil, obtained with cold pressing and traditional methods.

items.title: Family Values
items.description: The company reflects our family bonds: respect, collaboration and shared passion for our land.

items.title: Authentic Tradition
items.description: We preserve and transmit the methods of Sicilian olive oil tradition, adapting them to modern needs.

cta.title: Discover Our Oil
cta.description: Taste the authenticity of Sicilian extra virgin olive oil, selected with passion and tradition by OLIO GALIA.

items.description: 75 years of passion and Sicilian wisdom

hero.title: Waste Disposal Guide
hero.subtitle: How to properly recycle our product packaging
hero.description: Sustainability is important to us. Follow this guide to properly recycle each component of our packaging and contribute to environmental protection.

steps.title: Separate Components
steps.description: Carefully remove each component from the bottle: pipette, ring, and bulb.

steps.title: Clean Containers
steps.description: Rinse the bottle and pipette to remove any oil residue.

steps.title: Dispose Correctly
steps.description: Follow the table instructions to place each component in the appropriate recycling bin.

footer.note: For more information on waste disposal, consult your local municipality's guidelines.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Personal Data Processing Information
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how the website manages personal data of users who consult it, in compliance with EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) and Legislative Decree 196/2003 (Privacy Code).

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: The Data Controller is OLIO GALIA, with registered office in Sicily, Italy. For any information regarding privacy, you can contact us through the contact page of the site.

dataCollected.title: 2. Data Collected
dataCollected.content: During navigation and use of our e-commerce, we may collect the following types of data:
list: Navigation data: IP address, browser type, operating system, access time
Voluntarily provided data: name, surname, email, shipping address, phone number
Payment data: processed through Stripe (we do not store credit card data)
Technical and analytics cookies to improve user experience

purpose.title: 3. Processing Purposes
purpose.content: Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
list: Order management and fulfillment
Order-related communications (confirmations, shipments, support)
Sending newsletters and commercial communications (only with explicit consent)
Tax and accounting obligations required by law
Anonymous statistical analysis to improve the service

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: The processing of personal data is based on:
list: Execution of the sales contract
User's explicit consent for marketing purposes
Legal obligations (tax, accounting, administrative)

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Communication
dataSharing.content: Personal data may be communicated to:
list: Payment service providers (Stripe) for payment processing
Couriers and shippers for product delivery
Tax consultants and accountants for legal compliance
Competent authorities when required by law

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Personal data will be kept for the time strictly necessary for the purposes for which they were collected:
list: Order data: 10 years for tax and accounting obligations
Marketing data: until consent is revoked
Navigation data: maximum 24 months

userRights.title: 7. Data Subject Rights
userRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
list: Access your personal data and obtain a copy
Rectify or update inaccurate or incomplete data
Delete your data (right to be forgotten)
Limit data processing
Object to processing for marketing purposes
Request data portability
Withdraw consent at any time
Lodge a complaint with the Personal Data Protection Authority

security.title: 8. Data Security
security.content: We adopt adequate technical and organizational security measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction or accidental disclosure. Payments are managed through Stripe with SSL/TLS encryption.

changes.title: 9. Privacy Policy Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page indicating the date of last update.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding the processing of personal data, you can contact us through the contact section of the site.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Information on the use of cookies
cookiePolicy.intro: Our website uses cookies to ensure proper functioning of the site and improve browsing experience. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them and how you can manage them.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size) for a certain period, so you don't have to re-enter them every time you return to the site.

technical.title: Technical Cookies (Necessary)
technical.description: These cookies are essential for the functioning of the site and cannot be disabled. They allow to:
list: Maintain the shopping cart during navigation
Manage login session
Store language preferences (IT/EN)
Ensure security during navigation
technical.note: They do not require user consent as they are strictly necessary.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: We use analytics cookies to collect anonymous information about how visitors use the site:
list: Number of visitors and pages visited
Time spent on site
Traffic sources
Aggregated browsing behavior
analytics.note: This data helps us improve the site and user experience.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Our site uses third-party services that may install cookies:
list: Stripe: to manage payments securely
Google Analytics (if present): for anonymous statistical analysis
Social media: if social sharing buttons are present

cookieManagement.title: 3. How to Manage Cookies
cookieManagement.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already present on your device and set almost all browsers to block their installation.

browsers.title: Management through Browser:
list: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
Firefox: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and site data
Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage website data
Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

cookieManagement.note: Warning: disabling technical cookies may compromise some site functionalities, such as the shopping cart.

cookieList.title: 4. List of Cookies Used
cookieList.description: Below is the list of main cookies used on our site:

consent.title: 5. Cookie Consent
consent.content: The first time you visit our site, you will be shown an informative banner about cookies. You can choose to accept or refuse non-essential cookies. Necessary technical cookies will still be active to ensure site functionality.

updates.title: 6. Updates
updates.content: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically. We recommend checking this page regularly to be informed of any changes.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding the use of cookies, you can contact us through the contact section of the site.

subscription.portalEmailFallback: Can't find the email? Enter your email to receive a new access link.

subscription.ctaBannerDesc: Receive this product at home regularly. Shipping included!

termsOfService.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale
termsOfService.subtitle: General conditions of online sale
termsOfService.intro: These Terms and Conditions govern the online sale of products offered by OLIO GALIA. By placing an order on our site, you declare to fully accept these conditions.

companyInfo.title: 1. Company Information
companyInfo.content: OLIO GALIA is a company specialized in the selection and sale of high-quality Sicilian food products, with a particular focus on extra virgin olive oils.

contractFormation.title: 2. Contract Formation
contractFormation.content: The sales contract is completed when you receive the order confirmation via email. The confirmation contains:
list: Summary of ordered products
Prices (VAT included)
Shipping costs
Delivery address
Estimated delivery methods and times

prices.title: 3. Prices
prices.content: All prices shown on the site are in Euro (€) and inclusive of VAT. Prices may vary without notice, but the price applied will always be the one displayed at the time of order.
prices.shipping: Shipping costs are calculated based on weight, destination and will be clearly indicated before payment. We offer free shipping in Italy for orders over €50.

payment.title: 4. Payment Methods
payment.content: We accept the following secure payment methods through Stripe:
list: Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
Debit cards
Other payment methods supported by Stripe
payment.security: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We do not store your credit card data on our servers.

shipping.title: 5. Shipping and Delivery

timeframes.title: Delivery Times:
list: Italy: 3-5 working days
Europe: 5-7 working days
Rest of the world: 7-15 working days

shipping.tracking: You will receive an email with the tracking number as soon as the order is shipped.
shipping.issues: In case of delays or delivery problems, we invite you to contact us immediately.

withdrawal.title: 6. Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with the Consumer Code (Legislative Decree 206/2005), you have the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 days of receiving the products, without having to provide any reason.

procedure.title: How to exercise withdrawal:
list: Send a clear communication via email or contact section
Return products intact and in original packaging
Return costs are at your expense
You will receive a refund within 14 days of receiving the return

exclusions.title: Exclusions from right of withdrawal:
exclusions.content: The right of withdrawal does not apply to perishable or sealed food products that cannot be returned for hygienic or safety reasons, if opened after delivery.

returns.title: 7. Returns and Refunds
list: They are defective or damaged upon delivery
They do not correspond to what was ordered
The right of withdrawal is exercised within 14 days
returns.procedure: Contact us immediately in case of defective product. We will provide return instructions and, if necessary, provide replacement or full refund (including shipping costs).

warranty.title: 8. Conformity Warranty
warranty.content: All products sold are covered by the legal conformity warranty of 24 months, as provided by the Consumer Code. If a product has conformity defects, you have the right to repair, replacement, price reduction or contract resolution.

liability.title: 9. Liability Limitations
liability.content: OLIO GALIA will not be responsible for:
list: Delivery delays caused by courier or force majeure events
Indirect or consequential damages arising from product use
Incorrect information provided by customer (shipping address, email, etc.)

intellectualProperty.title: 10. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All site content (texts, images, logos, graphics) is property of OLIO GALIA or respective owners and is protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution or use of any content is prohibited.

privacy.title: 11. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, available at this link. By placing an order, you consent to the processing of your data as indicated in the information notice.

disputes.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: For any dispute relating to the interpretation, execution or validity of these Terms and Conditions, the Court of the consumer's place of residence will have jurisdiction (for consumers residing in Italy).
disputes.odr: In accordance with EU Regulation 524/2013, we inform you that you can use the ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) platform for alternative dispute resolution, available at the following link: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr

modifications.title: 13. Changes to Terms and Conditions
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be published on this page indicating the date of last update. By continuing to use the site after changes, you accept the new terms.

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.content: For any questions or clarifications regarding the Terms and Conditions, you can contact us through the contact section of the site.
